nodes.title: Software Engineer Portfolio Page
nodes.prompt: Kind: page. What: A portfolio page to showcase a software engineer's skills, experience, and projects. How: Organized layout with a hero section, skills section, projects section, and contact section. Properties: responsive, accessible, modern design.

nodes.title: Hero Section
nodes.prompt: Kind: section. What: Introduction section with a title, subtitle, and profile image. How: Hero layout with large text and an image, highlighting the SWE's name and profession. Properties: centered, responsive, visually appealing.

nodes.title: Skills Section
nodes.prompt: Kind: section. What: Lists technical skills and proficiencies. How: Grid layout with cards or badges for individual skills. Properties: interactive, organized, accessible.

nodes.title: Projects Section
nodes.prompt: Kind: section. What: Displays software engineering projects. How: Grid layout with cards showcasing project name, description, and links. Properties: responsive, informative, clickable.

nodes.title: Contact Section
nodes.prompt: Kind: section. What: Provides methods to contact the SWE. How: Contact form with fields for name, email, and message, and social media links. Properties: functional, accessible, responsive.

nodes.title: Hero Title
nodes.prompt: Kind: component. What: Displays the software engineer's name and title. How: Large, bold, and prominent text element for easy recognition, styled with red text for emphasis. Properties: readable, responsive, attention-grabbing.

nodes.title: Hero Subtitle
nodes.prompt: Kind: component. What: Provides a brief tagline or summary of the SWE's expertise. How: Smaller secondary text styled with proper spacing and typography. Properties: descriptive, readable.

nodes.title: Profile Image
nodes.prompt: Kind: component. What: Displays the SWE's profile picture. How: Circular or square image format with alt text for accessibility. Properties: accessible, responsive, visually appealing.

nodes.title: Skill Badge
nodes.prompt: Kind: component. What: Represents individual technical skills. How: Styled badge with hover effects and accessible labels. Properties: interactive, reusable.

nodes.title: Project Card
nodes.prompt: Kind: component. What: Displays project title, description, and a black button that leads to GitHub. How: Card layout with hover interactions and clickable links. Button: black background with white text, labeled 'View on GitHub'. Properties: responsive, informative, clickable, accessible.

nodes.title: Contact Form
nodes.prompt: Kind: component. What: Form to collect user messages. How: Styled inputs and buttons with validation for name, email, and message fields. Properties: functional, accessible.

nodes.title: Social Links Group
nodes.prompt: Kind: group. What: Displays social media icons with links. How: Horizontal layout of clickable icons for LinkedIn, GitHub, Twitter, etc. Properties: interactive, responsive, accessible.

nodes.title: Social Link
nodes.prompt: Kind: primitive. What: Individual social media link. How: Clickable icon with alt text and hover effects. Properties: accessible, clickable.
